item.title: Home

item.content:encoded:
Build , Trasform & Make Smart Business Decisions

Let's talk

FocByte Cloud Services

Are you ready to move your business to the cloud? We can help you. From Business strategy to process design to infrastructure and management, FocByte has it all to help your business realize your organization unique cloud advantage.

Why Move Your Business to the Cloud?

Application Modernization & Migration

We provide end-to-end application modernization and migration services to help you streamline your business performance. More

Cloud Analytics & AI

Combining the power of the cloud & advanced analytics, we use insight- driven methods to boost your business value. More

Cloud Business Transformation

We can help you establish a clear technology vision that perfectly aligns with your business needs and goals. More

Cloud Infrastructure & Engineering

Give a modern touch to your business with optimized public, private, hybrid & multi-cloud environments. More

Cloud Operating Model

Design, execute and sustain a modern operating model built for the cloud. Transform your cloud workforce. More

Cloud Operate

Reduce cloud complexity and enhance business value with scalable and flexible cloud operations. More

Cloud-Native Development

Create bespoke cloud- native solutions to help realize the transformative power of the cloud. More

Cyber & Strategy Risk

Transform your strategic risk programs confidently. We can help boost the value of your business. More

ERP & SaaS

Make it easy for your clients to access the software with NextGen ERP and SaaS. More

Hybrid Cloud

Drive better business outcomes, faster value delivery and sustainable ROI with Hybrid Cloud. More

Application Modernization & Migration

We provide end-to-end application modernization and migration services to help you streamline your business performance. More

Cloud Analytics & AI

Combining the power of the cloud & advanced analytics, we use insight- driven methods to boost your business value. More

Cloud Business Transformation

We can help you establish a clear technology vision that perfectly aligns with your business needs and goals. More

Cloud Infrastructure & Engineering

Give a modern touch to your business with optimized public, private, hybrid & multi-cloud environments. More

Cloud Operating Model

Design, execute and sustain a modern operating model built for the cloud. Transform your cloud workforce. More

Cloud Operate

Reduce cloud complexity and enhance business value with scalable and flexible cloud operations. More

Cloud-Native Development

Create bespoke cloud- native solutions to help realize the transformative power of the cloud. More

Cyber & Strategy Risk

Transform your strategic risk programs confidently. We can help boost the value of your business. More

ERP & SaaS

Make it easy for your clients to access the software with NextGen ERP and SaaS. More

Hybrid Cloud

Drive better business outcomes, faster value delivery and sustainable ROI with Hybrid Cloud. More

We Have a Specialization to Work in the following Industries

Airlines

Government

Space

Devops

Pipelines

Insurance

Banking

Sustainable Energy

Our Happy Clients

I have been using services by FocByte from past 1 year and it has been a lovely experience. The cloud services has helped us streamline the activities and has helped boost our business value in the market as well.

Smart Strategy

We help tailor solutions to help you meet the demand of the industry.

Easy Implementation

Our innovative products help you build a reliable foundation for growth.

Smart Operations

We deliver business outcomes to help you innovate & grow your business.

item.title: About us
item.dc:creator: focbyte
item.content:encoded:
Helping companies with digital transformation

Cloud migration involves more than a place, a journey or a new technology. It is an opportunity to reimagine your business and make it more streamlined with the market and customer changes and needs. Cloud is a catalyst for continuous reinvention. Our service providers have in-depth cloud expertise and have worked in this industry for the last 20 years. At FocByte, we engineer business transformations at every step.

Why Choose Cloud Consulting Services?

Our cloud consulting services can support your business and even help resolve design and infrastructure management issues. We help our clients create change that matters - transformation enabled by technology and sustained through capabilities. FocByte takes advantage of some of the latest cloud technologies like Windows, Linux, Azure, AWS and DevOps. To complement our in-house capabilities, we have multiple proprietary solutions, a dedicated capability-building academy and an ecosystem of partners with the worlds leading technology companies. This makes us truly different at FocByte. Unlike other tech providers, we come together as a team to help our clients get the best experience

Our Mission

We want a responsible, customer-focused corporation dedicated to our partners and colleagues by providing the latest technology.

Our Vision

To empower organizations with the knowledge and expertise to fully leverage the benefits of cloud technology and drive their digital transformation journey.

Our Partners

Smart Strategy

We help tailor solutions to help you meet the demand of the industry.

Easy Implementation

Our innovative products help you build a reliable foundation for growth.

Smart Operations

We deliver business outcomes to help you innovate & grow your business.

item.title: CloudTech
item.dc:creator: focbyte
item.content:encoded: Cloudtech is owned by Techforge, a global publisher in the UK. This is a successful community of cloud professionals and also reports cloud computing news distributions, new features by industry research. This community has over 1.8 billion group members on LinkedIn alone. Tt hosts many podcasts related to cloud computing, marketing, and wearable technologies.

item.title: Cloud lorem ipsum blog post
item.dc:creator: focbyte
item.content:encoded:
The cloud represents a $3 trillion opportunity for organisationsbut many struggle to capitalise on its full potential. By approaching cloud transformation as an IT system upgrade, they miss out on much of the value it can create. The risk isnt just falling behind the competition. Its dropping out of it altogether.

Clouds first movers are already forging ahead. They successfully integrate cloud into every facet of their businessleveraging it to rejuvenate operations, drive innovation, and make pioneering, experimental leaps into new verticals and new markets.

The cloud represents a $3 trillion opportunity for organizations—but many struggle to capitalize on its full potential. By approaching cloud transformation as an IT system upgrade, they miss out on much of the value it can create. The risk isn’t just falling behind the competition. It’s dropping out of it altogether.

Cloud’s first movers are already forging ahead. They successfully integrate cloud into every facet of their business—leveraging it to rejuvenate operations, drive innovation, and make pioneering, experimental leaps into new verticals and new markets.

item.title: Application Modernization & Migration
item.dc:creator: focbyte
item.content:encoded:
Application Modernization and Migration

Migration to Cloud and Modernization of Application

Costs Optimization to Modernize Your Legacy

Our application modernization and migration services can help your business IT functions with an efficient approach to transforming legacy platform-based enterprise applications. This approach offers flexibility to meet specific needs, no matter how complex.

Transform Your Business with FocByte

Learn how our organization is helping clients transform traditional businesses into a disruptive market forces.

Benefits of Application Modernization and Cloud Migration

Boost Efficiency

In the competitive world, businesses should be able to pivot in new market conditions to align resources faster with business needs.

Better Insights

Using artificial intelligence to improve business performance and provide our end-users with a superior experience

Risk Reduction

Built-in cloud security efficiently mitigates interruption risks and supports continued operations in a regulated environment.

Costs Optimization

Modernizing can assist in managing operations as IT infrastructure and resource costs shifts to cloud computing solutions.

Agile and Strategic Workforce

With modernization and migration, get a mobile and strategically oriented workforce to fulfill market and customer needs.

Better Innovation

With migration and modernization, you may use new technology to assist crucial choices and get new insights into growth potential.

Smart Strategy

We help tailor solutions to help you meet the demand of the industry.

Easy Implementation

Our innovative products help you build a reliable foundation for growth.

Smart Operations

We deliver business outcomes to help you innovate & grow your business.

item.title: Cloud Analytics and AI
item.dc:creator: focbyte
item.content:encoded:
Cloud Analytics
and AI

Unlock new business insights with data analytics and AI

FocByte Cloud Analytics Solutions

FocByte provides data science consulting services to increase data speed, administration, and security. Data is at the heart of every analytics project, and FocByte provides hybrid cloud IT solutions to expedite data analysis and increase data availability.

Machine Learning

Our machine-learning solutions assist and empower your business in interpreting and managing complex data. The system manages large amounts of data and identifies patterns and relationships that can be used to predict or take action on new data.

Deep Learning

Our cloud-based data analytics solutions help our clients implement machine learning models to find patterns in the data. This technique allows businesses to provide innovative solutions to some long-standing problems.

Artificial Intelligence

The data engineers and developers create Artificial Intelligence and automation solutions to create a coherent and sustainable AI-driven ecosystem for businesses of all sizes. This can include start-ups, SMEs and globally operating companies.

Benefits of Cloud Analytics and AI

Advanced cloud analytics tools include AI algorithms that help you understand trends and opportunities in very big data sets. Let us look at some key benefits of cloud analytics and AI.

Cost Effective

With cloud analytics and AI, you only pay for the services you use. If you are a small start-up business owner, you can reduce your infrastructure costs by up to 90%.

Quick Deployment

Not only do you pay for what you use, but with cloud analytics and AI, you can use on-demand services when needed. You can quickly deploy or remove as per your requirements.

Simplicity

Cloud analytics and AI use the latest technology & best practices. With the help of improved communication, employees can have a separate workstation to collaborate.

Efficiency

With the improved flexibility of the cloud, it is possible to create an efficient system that delivers fast results at every level of your business.

How Are We Different?

At FocByte, our Cloud analytics and AI services help your business provide cost-effective solutions and allocate resources where needed. We bring you a tech experience with a business-led approach to meet your unique business needs.
Our innovative products and assets help you quickly jump-start your cloud strategy journey. We are a cloud vendor and we believe in a best-for-you when it comes to cloud solutions.

Smart Strategy

We help tailor solutions to help you meet the demand of the industry.

Easy Implementation

Our innovative products help you build a reliable foundation for growth.

Smart Operations

We deliver business outcomes to help you innovate & grow your business.

item.title: Cloud Business Transformation
item.dc:creator: focbyte
item.content:encoded:
Cloud Business Transformation

Digitally transform your business with FocByte

Value of Digital Transformation

Despite the promises made by various cloud companies, many organizations have yet to get the benefits they expect from their cloud investment. To solve this problem, newly disruptive forces like remote work, decreased revenues, altered global supply and higher.

Cloud Business Transformation

At FocByte, accelerate your cloud business transformation efforts with digitalization. Our cloud business transformation services act as a connective tissue between business and IT to help streamline business activities. We can help our clients establish a clear technology vision that perfectly aligns with their business needs and goals.

How Do We Get It Done?

Our services are adaptable, and our strategy focuses on establishing and satisfying your business requirements. At FocByte, we help you meet your business needs. We have best-in-class frameworks, assets and secured data patterns to help you accelerate the journey to the cloud. From crafting new solutions to complex problems or using new technologies to address new opportunities, we are proficient in helping facilitate the best services.

Reimagine Your Vision

FocByte offers virtual labs to help reimagine the possibilities of your sector and cloud. And we can achieve this regardless of the cloud service provider partner or in collaboration with your preferred hyper-scale.

Rapid Prototyping

We use our Cloud Garage team to immerse you in a secure innovation environment where they can quickly create and prototype solutions. You may disrupt existing value streams while creating new value.

Strategic Definition

Accelerate your cloud business transformation with FocByte. Our Cloud Workbench, Cloud Accelerator and Capacity Edge help you to scale your journey through a comprehensive data strategy and an operating model.

Implementation Design

We combine all essential FocByte products, such as Application Modernization, data and AI, and DevOps, to provide a unified approach for your implementation. We can swiftly get your modernization efforts off the ground.

Key Benefits of Cloud Business Transformation

Let us look at some of the benefits of cloud business transformation.

Driving Business and Product Innovation

Driving business and product innovation Accelerated development and deployment of new goods and services to better suit existing and new consumer groups and their rising demands

Enhancing Business Value

Improved cost savings and margins by transitioning from major capital technology expenditures to operational-based investment and achieving operational efficiency.

Accelerating the Digital Agenda

Use data and insight-driven decision-making to prioritise digital efforts and promote stakeholder cooperation.

Self-Funding Digital Transformation

Leverage spending optimization and delivery transformation, as well as our consultancy, tax, and audit skills and partner ecosystem roles, to decrease transition costs while limiting the BAU effect.

How Are We Different?

At FocByte, our cloud business transformation services help businesses provide cost- effective solutions and allocate resources where needed. We bring them a tech experience with a business-led approach to meet their unique business needs.
Our innovative products and assets help you quickly jump-start your cloud strategy journey. We are a cloud vendor and we believe in a best-for-you when it comes to cloud solutions. Our mission is to be a responsible, customer-focused corporation dedicated to our partners and colleagues. With FocByte, you can build a new world where you will benefit significantly from digital transformation to a more resilient future.

Smart Strategy

We help tailor solutions to help you meet the demand of the industry.

Easy Implementation

Our innovative products help you build a reliable foundation for growth.

Smart Operations

We deliver business outcomes to help you innovate & grow your business.

item.title: Cloud Native Development
item.dc:creator: focbyte
item.content:encoded:
Cloud Native Development

Building cloud-native applications to optimize and scale your cloud platform

Cloud-native solutions offered by FocByte promote innovation and accelerate business growth in the market. You can learn how a cloud-native development strategy may help you transform old systems and monolithic applications and identify cost reductions that can fuel future business growth.
Cloud-native technology allows your company the flexibility and agility to stay up with the never-ever-changing competitive landscape.

There has been an increase in the need for the following capabilities in todays business market.

Business Resiliency Prepare for the Next Normal

Resilient recovery is crucial in shifting economic and global environments. Firms must constantly manage new health risks and other possible difficulties.

Human Element Hike in Touchless Interactions

Nowadays customers, brokers and workers want cloud-powered interactions that are intuitive, straightforward and need little to no engagement.

Mobile Innovation Mobile Interaction Proliferation

Creating one's own experience has become commonplace. Because of the growth of connection, simplicity of use, & accessibility, cloud computing is important.

Digital Commerce Increased Disruptive Models

New businesses benefit from expanding capabilities by cloud to engage more customers to sell and scale their capabilities.

How Cloud Native Can Help?

Cloud-native services can help your business with an ecosystem that can accelerate digital transformation. Let us take a look at the key benefits of using cloud-native services.

Speed

Cloud-native ecosystems can help accelerate your digital transformations. It also helps build new capabilities to respond to market and technology shifts without unwanted complexities.

Innovation

Cloud-native services help you access data quickly allowing real-time customer insights. It helps you design, build and deploy technology solutions with automated and agile cloud services

Cost Savings

To achieve cost reductions by scaling capacity as needed and supporting granular expenditure management, you need an end-to-end process that covers design, technology choices, architecture and operations.

How Are We Different?

At FocByte, our cloud-native computing services focus on building born-on-the-cloud digital applications with an emphasis on customer relationship experience, digital commerce for total business model transformation, and mobile innovation leading the next frontier for change.
Our cloud computing consulting services help you jump-start your journey hassle-free. We are a cloud vendor and we believe in a best-for-you when it comes to cloud solutions.

Smart Strategy

We help tailor solutions to help you meet the demand of the industry.

Easy Implementation

Our innovative products help you build a reliable foundation for growth.

Smart Operations

We deliver business outcomes to help you innovate & grow your business.

item.title: Cloud Operate
item.dc:creator: focbyte
item.content:encoded:
Cloud
Operate

Enhanced business value with reduced cloud complexity

FocByte Cloud Operate Solutions help you set up a secure, comprehensive platform tailored to your business needs. Our services help you drive value from the cloud and allows you to combine the cloud operations into a single view, under a single program and at scale. Our cloud operating model supports your whole cloud tech-stack, including third- party services. We manage the entire infrastructure using our OpenCloud platform. When FocByte takes care of your cloud environment maintenance & operations, you can concentrate on driving innovation and strategic initiatives for business growth.

How do We Deliver Cloud Operate?

Our engagement strategy is based on a single service umbrella that integrates distinct point solutions to generate a holistic perspective of your needs. Then, with a single point of contact within FocByte to assist you in meeting those objectives, you get a one-stop shop for navigating cloud-first problem-solving and solution implementation.

Impact of Cloud Operate

Working with FocByte Cloud Operate on your cloud ecosystem can be deeply transformational for your organization. With FocByte Cloud Operate Services, our clients can quickly leverage comprehensive solutions to improve business outcomes and performance. We have a talented team of cloud professionals who can help your cloud needs become a reality.

All Your Needs Under One Cloud

Our cloud solution offers a bundle of on-demand services under the FocByte umbrella that can deliver the Cloud Operate Services you need across the entire organization.

Improved Business Performance

With our Cloud Operate solutions, our clients can improve innovation while controlling costs, adhering to faster release schedules - thus increasing your market competitiveness.

Secure Solution

We believe in designing custom cloud solutions that match your business requirements. Our high level of automation supports improved security across your cloud ecosystem.

Secure Cloud Ecosystem

We help with complex cloud landscapes, including hybrid solutions, multi-cloud and on-prem infrastructure that enables these solutions to function smoothly together.

Talented Staff

We have qualified professionals working across all cloud computing platforms to fill gaps - on an as-needed basis. Our solutions can be used on a project-based or ongoing basis to suit your requirements.

How Are We Different?

At FocByte, our cloud operate services focus on building born-on-the-cloud digital applications with an emphasis on customer relationship experience, digital commerce for total business model transformation, and mobile innovation leading the next frontier for change.
Our cloud computing consulting services help you jump-start your journey hassle-free. We are a cloud vendor and we believe in a best-for-you when it comes to cloud solutions. Our mission is to be a responsible, customer-focused corporation dedicated to our partners and colleagues.

Smart Strategy

We help tailor solutions to help you meet the demand of the industry.

Easy Implementation

Our innovative products help you build a reliable foundation for growth.

Smart Operations

We deliver business outcomes to help you innovate & grow your business.

item.title: Cloud workforce and Operating model
item.dc:creator: focbyte
item.content:encoded:
Cloud Workforce and Operating Model

Achieve your possible with cloud
workforce and operating model services

The cloud alters how work is performed, who performs it and what tools and processes are required for success. Traditional infrastructure is physical and might take months to build, but cloud apps, services and products are almost immediate, therefore everything and everyone moves quicker.

On the other hand, many businesses treat the Cloud as just another technology project. They go through the motions of implementing cloud capabilities, meeting business objectives and generating a competitive difference. However, there are better ways to maximize their cloud investment.

Building minimum viable products and iterating continually necessitates having the right cloud workforce and operating model and - in certain cases - a total holistic transformation in organizational philosophy and culture. Addressing holistic operating model issues can help improve cloud capabilities to achieve the following areas.

Improved Return on Investment (ROI)

Achieve and scale cloud milestones more rapidly

Reduced
Risk

Address cloud adoption issues before implementation

Talented
Workforce

Develop talent that can deliver core cloud capabilities

Improved Operations Effectiveness

Integrate collaboratively across IT and business

Improved
Financials

Make your budget process nimble & shift from CAPEX to OPEX.

Increased
Efficiency

Underpin cloud operations with Application Program Interfaces

Why Choose FocByte?

Our Cloud Workforce and Operating Model Transformation services can help you focus on your operating and talent models in tandem. We help your business transition from current to future roles as you run more applications on the cloud.

Improve ROI in Cloud Spend

Assess your cloud capabilities and conduct the cloud maturity assessment to find gaps within processes, people and technology.

Enhance Cloud Operations

At FocByte, we will help redesign and design the desired target - producing a roadmap to kickstart your journey. We will design a cloud operating model to deliver your products.

Accelerate Enterprise Adoption of Cloud

Chart your path with cloud solutions. FocByte will help you identify actions needed to manage cloud migration and create lean processes.

Understand Workforce Readiness & gaps

FocByte will help you assess your capabilities by identifying the current skills gaps and mapping skills to future roles.

Build Your Cloud-Enabled Workforce

Our solution forecasts your future cloud-enabled workforce minimizing talent gaps while retaining top talent.

Current Organizational Structure Constraints

Time to bring your operating model to life, and we will collaborate to define the ecosystem of roles and teams.

How Are We Different?

At FocByte, our Cloud workforce and operating model services focus on building born- on-the-cloud digital applications with an emphasis on customer relationship experience, digital commerce for total business model transformation, and mobile innovation leading the next frontier for change.
Our cloud computing consulting services help you jump-start your journey hassle-free. We are a cloud vendor and we believe in a best-for-you when it comes to cloud solutions. Our mission is to be a responsible, customer-focused corporation dedicated to our partners and colleagues.

Smart Strategy

We help tailor solutions to help you meet the demand of the industry.

Easy Implementation

Our innovative products help you build a reliable foundation for growth.

Smart Operations

We deliver business outcomes to help you innovate & grow your business.

item.title: Cyber Risk Strategy
item.dc:creator: focbyte
item.content:encoded:
Cyber
Risk Strategy

Build new capabilities and transform your organization

What Are Your Security Objectives?

Overcome your greatest organizational security hurdles with FocByte. Together, we will quickly develop a plan, design strategy, or even manage ongoing operations to streamline the business workflow - with your digital security in mind. With FocByte, navigate your most critical paths, realize salient outcomes and position your organization to thrive with minimum rish and maximum safety.
  • Protect the enterprise
  • Build and restore trust
  • Spearhead business enablement
  • Manage multifaceted risk
  • Provide vision and drive growth

Solutions

Cyber and strategic risks do not operate in a silo and neither does FocByte.

Cyber Safety

We create and deploy transformative enterprise security plans, organizational structures, and capabilities to help you better manage cyber threats aligned with business goals.

Our capabilities include the following

  • Cyber assessments, frameworks and benchmarking
  • Cyber strategy and program transformation
  • Cyber metrics, reporting and risk quantification
  • Cyber awareness, board reporting and training
  • Integrated risk management/governance, risk management and compliance
  • Third-party cyber risk
  • Insider threat programs

Extended Organization

Risk is constantly there and moving through your third-party ecosystem. We will assist you in evaluating and managing these risks in your company by going beyond finding gaps in your defense to improve overall enterprise performance and take you closer to your strategic business objectives.

Our capabilities include the following

  • Crisis response
  • Crisis recovery
  • Resilience

Crisis and Resilience

How do you anticipate, react, and even avoid potential crises? We provide a collaborative platform with leading-edge tools and insights to help you become more resilient to crises and the risks that may cause them. How do you anticipate, react, and even avoid potential crises? We provide a collaborative platform with leading-edge tools and insights to help you become more resilient to crises and the risks that may cause them.

Our capabilities include the following

  • Crisis response
  • Crisis recovery
  • Resilience

Strategy, Brand and Reputation

A brand should be aware enough to sense threats, measure outcomes and shape perceptions. In this constantly changing world, we are here to help you manage risk, reduce threats and even achieve business objectives. We go a step further by sharing opportunities to enhance and protect your brand and reputation and achieve long-term performance.

Our capabilities include the following

  • Enterprise risk management
  • Brand and reputation risk
  • Brand operations services

How Are We Different?

At FocByte, our Cyber Risk Strategy services focus on building born-on-the-cloud digital applications with an emphasis on customer relationship experience, digital commerce for total business model transformation, and mobile innovation leading the next frontier for change.
Our cloud computing consulting services help you jump-start your journey hassle-free. We are a cloud vendor and we believe in a best-for-you when it comes to cloud solutions. Our mission is to be a responsible, customer-focused corporation dedicated to our partners and colleagues.

Smart Strategy

We help tailor solutions to help you meet the demand of the industry.

Easy Implementation

Our innovative products help you build a reliable foundation for growth.

Smart Operations

We deliver business outcomes to help you innovate & grow your business.

item.title: Hybrid Cloud
item.dc:creator: focbyte
item.content:encoded:
Hybrid
Cloud

Design your possible

Hybrid cloud integrates information systems allowing your business to maximize IT capabilities and help businesses achieve better outcomes. Hybrid cloud solutions are all about designing, building and embracing your possibilities.

Benefits of Hybrid Cloud

Not sure about which hybrid cloud services are best for your business infrastructure? Here are some key benefits of a hybrid cloud.

  • A hybrid cloud allows your business to modernize faster with data and application portability from core to all business sizes.
  • It is a solution that lets you innovate and respond quickly to market changes and shifting customer demands.
  • Hybrid cloud is extremely secure and scalable with robust cyber and compliance provisions.
  • With Hybrid cloud, your business can realign IT operating models to manage costs to concentrate more on strategic business needs.

How Can FocByte Help?

At FocByte, we aim to help you optimize a hybrid cloud ecosystem based on your unique technical requirements and business and governance needs. We focus on helping align your technology with processes and strategy.
To deliver your tailored cloud solution, our hybrid cloud providers get you a unique combination of global resources and deep industry knowledge. This will help you see your potential and transform it into a reality that helps you gain the portability, visibility and control needed to run workloads where you want them. And with the flexibility to change providers and cloud configurations when needed.

Cloud Strategy & Planning

Review existing applications for business and technical requirements to determine each cloud readiness

Cloud
Workbench

You can determine your optimal path to the cloud & assess the total cost of ownership

Application Modernization and Migration

Refactor apps to make them more capable of leveraging public cloud resources, delivering additional value.

Hybrid Cloud Architecture

Choose the right hybrid cloud architecture components, including on-premises infrastructure

Edge
Computing

Integrate multi-access edge computing for increased data and application mobility via 5G and IoT connection and data.

Deployment

Create a hybrid cloud platform that covers all infrastructure types like public clouds & containers.

How Are We Different?

At FocByte, our Hybrid Cloud services help your business provide cost-effective solutions and allocate resources where needed. We bring you a tech experience with a business-led approach to meet your unique business needs.
Our innovative products and assets help you quickly jump-start your cloud strategy journey. We are a cloud vendor and we believe in a best-for-you when it comes to cloud solutions.

Smart Strategy

We help tailor solutions to help you meet the demand of the industry.

Easy Implementation

Our innovative products help you build a reliable foundation for growth.

Smart Operations

We deliver business outcomes to help you innovate & grow your business.

item.title: Cloud Infrastructure and Engineering
item.dc:creator: focbyte
item.content:encoded:
Cloud Infrastructure and Engineering

Sharpen your technical skillsFocByte cloud infrastructure and engineering services can help design, implement and integrate existing core compute, network, storage and security services with new hybrid, edge and multi-cloud initiatives. We help modernize data centers and networks through automation and software-defined capabilities, making them current and sustainable for cloud use.

Creating the future

We assist with the modernization of data centers and networks through automation and software-defined capabilities, bringing your organization up-to-date for sustainable cloud use. In addition, we design infrastructure systems to support Everything-as-a-Service (XaaS) solutions and edge computing. The result is transformative programs that help businesses transition into a new, dynamic environment of peak performance.
We help you convert lofty visions into actions by adopting a business-focused approach to understanding your digital transformation needs. Our proven experience and end-to- end cloud services help develop a technology foundation for the future.

Data Center Modernization

Creating infrastructure capable of handling big data

The market has just begun to scratch the surface of what new digital technologies will do and how they will change how people work, play and govern. Game-changing business outcomes are made feasible because emerging digital technologies, such as IP-based sensors, the Internet of Things (IoT), artificial intelligence (AI) and robots gained access to the massive data systems they needed to operate.

Infrastructure and data centers will continue to stay as businesses are now adopting the public cloud to streamline business workflow. Many companies will still have a hybrid or multi-cloud solution for some time as transformations to existing data centers and significant integration to the edge and public cloud computing ensue.

FocByte leads modernizing data centers to be accessible on the cloud and integrate with new XaaS solutions and IoT devices. Our team is proficient in re-engineering legacy applications to modern languages and onboarding these to cloud systems.

Infrastructure Transformation

Simplifying management and reducing costs

A modern technological infrastructure is a primary facilitator for the next generation of business. Today's Chief Information Officers, Chief Technology Officers and Chief Operating Officers are taking a different approach to administering their technological infrastructure. Helping businesses achieve a cloud infrastructure built for the future - be it public, private and hybrid cloud is one of our strengths at FocByte.

We help engineer your business dreams beyond what you may have imagined possible. Our strengths include advising organizations on the right approach, operating IT in the cloud and implementing next-gen technologies.

As a result, companies may scale up or down to meet demand, use more processing power, increase reliability and performance - and even withstand cyber attacks and regulatory scrutiny.

Cloud Network and Monitoring

Consolidating infrastructure and enabling state-of-the-art monitoring FocByte helps create dynamic architecture to enable smooth connectivity of server, storage, mainframe and network with reduced cost in mind, confirming it promotes and supports mobile users and IoT devices in a secure fashion - reason enough to upgrade a network. Multi-cloud and hybrid cloud platforms may also be controlled centrally, transforming outdated administration and monitoring systems into modern, predictive, highly automated systems. We can also determine whether cloud-managed services and brokerage are appropriate to fulfill your business requirements.

People-Centered Operations

Supporting ongoing workloads effectively.

We construct cloud engineering solutions that assist in managing and monitoring private, public and hybrid cloud systems to support IT operations in the cloud.Establishing a cloud center of excellence reduces infrastructure costs through consolidated vendor contracts and enables organizational uniformity and oversight, which reduces friction.

Workloads can become efficient using a new cloud operating paradigm that employs DevOps and microservices to scale up and down efforts effectively. In addition, security - which is a mission-critical operation - is rigorously guarded by IT specialists.

How Are We Different?

At FocByte, our Cloud Infrastructure and Engineering services focus on building born- on-the-cloud digital applications with an emphasis on customer relationship experience, digital commerce for total business model transformation, and mobile innovation leading the next frontier for change.
Our cloud computing consulting services help you jump-start your journey hassle-free. We are a cloud vendor and we believe in a best-for-you when it comes to cloud solutions. Our mission is to be a responsible, customer-focused corporation dedicated to our partners and colleagues.

Smart Strategy

We help tailor solutions to help you meet the demand of the industry.

Easy Implementation

Our innovative products help you build a reliable foundation for growth.

Smart Operations

We deliver business outcomes to help you innovate & grow your business.

Infrastructure and data centers will continue to stay as businesses are now adopting the public cloud to streamline business workflow. Many companies will still have a hybrid or multi-cloud solution for some time as transformations to existing data centers and significant integration to the edge and public cloud computing ensue.

item.dc:creator: focbyte
item.content:encoded:
ERP and SAAS

Coming Soon...

Smart Strategy

We help tailor solutions to help you meet the demand of the industry.

Easy Implementation

Our innovative products help you build a reliable foundation for growth.

Smart Operations

We deliver business outcomes to help you innovate & grow your business.
